welcome_message_body: Welcome to Campeche, where the colorful colonial architecture and rich history await you. Take your time to explore the city's charming streets, vibrant markets, and delicious cuisine. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in this beautiful destination.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Campeche International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
